show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
CNN’s Bait-and-Switch ‘Journalism’; Salute to Amiri Baraka Chris Cuomo of CNN’s “New Day” probably thought that a good... <!--more--> way to dig himself and his program out of the ratings pit it’s in (down 33% in viewership from when it debuted six months ago) would be to do a bait-and-switch with Dennis Rodman.
His billed “exclusive” live interview with the mercurial Dennis Rodman and his ex-NBA colleagues to discuss “basketball diplomacy” with the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea yielded a mother lode of buzz; Cuomo masterfully goaded Rodman into an epic meltdown.
Leid Stories breaks down Rodman’s breakdown and exposes Cuomo’s – and CNN’s – hidden, unethical agenda.
Amiri Baraka, the people’s poet laureate, died yesterday at age 79.
We salute him with his own words.
